fields.inlineHelpText: Date when the NC was closed.
fields.label: Close Date

fields.inlineHelpText: Additional Information relating to the closure of NC
fields.label: Comments
fields.name: compliancequest__Closure_Comment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the Containment was completed.
fields.label: Containment Completion Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Completion_Date_Containment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the Disposition was completed.
fields.label: Disposition Completion Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Completion_Date_Disposition__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the Investigation was completed.
fields.label: Investigation Completion Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Completion_Date_Investigation__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if immediate Containment Actions are required. When checked, at least one containment action must be added to the response.
fields.label: Containment Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Containment_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Detailed description of the problem that the NC will address.
fields.label: Description
fields.name: compliancequest__Description__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if an approval is required for Disposition.
fields.label: Disposition Approval Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Disposition_Approval__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the Disposition is required. When checked atleast one Disposition must be performed and all the Impacted Part/Lot quantity must be dispositioned.
fields.label: Disposition Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Disposition_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the Containment action(s) are due.
fields.label: Containment Due Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Due_Date_Containment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the Disposition is due.
fields.label: Disposition Due Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Due_Date_Disposition__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the Investigation is due.
fields.label: Investigation Due Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Due_Date_Investigation__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if an approval is required for Investigation.
fields.label: Investigation Approval Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Investigation_Approval__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the Investigation is required. When checked an Investigation must be performed in order to close the NC.
fields.label: Investigation Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Investigation_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Checked if a record is locked
fields.label: Is Locked
fields.name: compliancequest__Is_Locked__c

fields.inlineHelpText: A simple headline summary for the NC.
fields.label: Title
fields.name: compliancequest__NC_Title__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date when NC occurred.
fields.label: Occurrence Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Occurrence_Date__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Criticality selected indicates the urgency of this NC.
fields.label: Criticality
fields.name: compliancequest__Priority__c

fields.inlineHelpText: External reference number if there is an artifact created from a 3rd party (supplier, customer, auditor, etc.).
fields.label: QMS Reference Number
fields.name: compliancequest__QMS_Reference_Number__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Specify the action(s) identified to address the NC.
fields.label: Recommended Action
fields.name: compliancequest__Recommended_Action__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Description of how the problem has been addressed by the NC.
fields.label: Resolution
fields.name: compliancequest__Resolution__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The supplier or customer relating to the NC.
fields.label: Account
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Account__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The department that is responsible for the NC.
fields.label: Department
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Department__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The contact from the supplier or customer that will be involved with the NC.
fields.label: External Contact
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_External_Contact__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The nonconforming product that the NC will address.
fields.label: Product
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Part__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The nonconforming service that the NC will address.
fields.label: Process
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Service__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The type of issue which can be Product or Process.
fields.label: Issue Type
fields.name: compliancequest__Type_Of_Issue__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The type of NC which can be Customer, Internal, or Supplier.
fields.label: NC Type
fields.name: compliancequest__Type__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Measuring unit for the nonconforming product.
fields.label: Unit of Measure
fields.name: compliancequest__Unit_of_Measure__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Total lot quantity affected from all the impacted part(s) identified.
fields.label: Total Impacted Lot Quantity
fields.name: compliancequest__Total_Impacted_Lot_Quantities__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Cost incurred due to the defect.
fields.label: Cost of Defect

fields.label: Defect Category
fields.name: compliancequest__Defect_Category__c

fields.label: Defect / Failure

fields.label: Defect Description

fields.inlineHelpText: Severity selected indicates the degree of impact.
fields.label: Defect Severity
fields.name: compliancequest__Defect_Severity__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Total quantity for the defect identified.
fields.label: Defective Quantity
fields.name: compliancequest__Defective_Quantity__c

fields.label: Quantity

fields.label: No. of Defects

fields.label: Approval Matrix
